text: Mindanao Cebuano is a dialect of Cebuano spoken mostly in Northern Mindanao, Zamboanga Peninsula, Caraga, and Soccsksargen, particularly in General Santos, the southernmost city in the Philippines. The dialect has differing vocabulary from those used in Cebu.https://www.binisaya.com/content/dialectology-cebuano- similarities-and-differences It is also separate but closely related to Davaoe√±o Cebuano, which has significant borrowing from the Tagalog language.http://ijarw.com/PublishedPaper/IJARW2381.pdf ==Vocabulary== Standard Cebuano (Carcar) Mindanao Cebuano (Gen. Santos) Hitsas ta alang sa Sinulog. Andam ta alang sa Sinulog. Palihog basig humigason aning sud-an. Palihog basig amigason aning sud-an. Naa'y tang-a sa dalom nga lamesa. Naa'y ok-ok sa dalom nga lamesa. Daghay ug langgam naga lupad. Daghan dyod langgam naga lupad. Daot na si Ana kay nagbalatian siya. Niwang na si Ana kay nagbalatian siya. Batig siya'g batasan no! Maot siya'g batasan no! ==References== Category:Dialects of the Philippines
title: Mindanao Cebuano
